/** * Returns a description of the plan that is generated by the assembler and * also of the arguments if they are available. The description should be simple * text as it may be rendered in different environments (console, web interface, ...). * Typical things that should be included are: *
    *
  • expected input format
    • *
  • description of output
    • *
  • description of what is done
    • *
  • description of arguments to customize plan if available
    • *
* * @return A description of the program and of its arguments if available. */
